description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Flex -- the flexible piece dropping game.  Flex is all about options. There are over 30 options that can be changed to customize the game to your liking. Hopefully, there's something here that will interest you. If the game is too hard or too easy, change the settings. If you want a different style of game, change the options.
description.short: Flex -- the flexible piece dropping game.  Flex is all about options. There are over 30 options that can be changed to customize the game to your liking. Hopefully, there's something here that will interest you. If the game is too hard or too easy, change the settings. If you want a different style of game, change the options.
